name: How to Make Garlic Paste
description: Learn how to make a fresh and fabulous garlic paste. Garlic puree will speed up your cooking time, and it's easy to make ahead and store!
ingredients: 40-45 cloves Fresh garlic (approximately 4 heads of garlic)
instructions: Peel garlic into individual cloves, chopping the ends to allow for a smooth garlic paste. In your food processor (or blender) add garlic cloves and oil. Blend until a smooth paste forms. Scrape down the sides as needed, eliminating any remaining chunks. Store and use as directed.
